properties.entry:
INSERT INTO TB_PLAN_OPTION ( PLAN_NO , PLAN_TITLE , PLAN_SDATE , PLAN_EDATE , PLAN_AGE , PLAN_ACC , PLAN_BUDGET , PLAN_SCRAP_YN , PLAN_PRIVATE , PLAN_MEMO , PLAN_TYPE , PLAN_TRANS , USER_NO
) VALUES ( SEQ_PLANNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO TB_PLAN_MAP ( PLAN_MAP_NO , PLAN_DAY , PLAN_PLACE , PLAN_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_PLANMAPNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , SEQ_PLANNO.NEXTVAL - 1 )

SELECT PLAN_NO , PLAN_TITLE , PLAN_SDATE , PLAN_EDATE , PLAN_AGE , PLAN_ACC , PLAN_BUDGET , PLAN_SCRAP_YN , PLAN_PRIVATE , PLAN_MEMO , PLAN_TYPE , PLAN_TRANS , USER_NO FROM TB_PLAN_OPTION WHERE PLAN_NO = ?
SELECT PLAN_MAP_NO , PLAN_DAY , PLAN_PLACE , PLAN_NO FROM TB_PLAN_MAP WHERE PLAN_NO = ?

UPDATE TB_PLAN_OPTION SET PLAN_NO = ? , PLAN_TITLE = ? , PLAN_SDATE = ? , PLAN_EDATE = ? , PLAN_AGE = ? , PLAN_ACC = ? , PLAN_BUDGET = ? , PLAN_SCRAP_YN = ? , PLAN_PRIVATE = ? , PLAN_MEMO = ? , PLAN_TYPE = ? , PLAN_TRANS = ? WHERE PLAN_NO = ?
UPDATE TB_PLAN_MAP SET PLAN_MAP_NO = ? , PLAN_DAY = ? , PLAN_PLACE = ? WHERE PLAN_NO = ?
